name: Kitchen Simulator 2015
description: Kitchen simulator, The game that turns you into the chef. As the owner and chef of your very own restaurant, you now have the responsibilities to keep your place clean, serving quality meals to your hungry customers, Impressing the high class to get to that fancy five star...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Supported Resolutions 1024x768 ,1366x768 ,1920x1080, 4k
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: i7 4790k Intel 4.0 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 series card or higher. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Supported Resolutions 1024x768 ,1366x768 ,1920x1080, 4k

reviews.review_text: If you are normal, do not buy it.
My bacon fell through the floor.

This game made me wish Hitler were still alive. I have never refunded something so fast in my life. This game started at $20, with the devs bribing and lying to people about the costs, it went down to $10 and now it's still somehow buyable. It should be free and even if it were free I wouldn't touch it. I'd rather fill a shotgun with glass and fire it up my beautiful female genitals than play this game. It's glitchy, you can't pick up anything unless you move at the speed of f@#k and the upgrades are almost impossible to reach.   You can't find anything, you don't have nearly as enough time needed to both find and 'cook' what's needed. Just...just run. Run away, just get off this page.  Pros. Cool idea and pretty fun concept.  Variety of foods to use and free cooking ( eh..kinda)  Could be fun game if bored or low IQ  Cons. This game exists.   Waste of a good idea
Picked up meat Drop it Picked up fish Drop it Picked up chip Drop it Picked up meat again Drop it  11/10 would make another dropping !!!
